message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm confident we can agree on a price that works for both of us. To start, I'm proposing $16,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe we can find a price closer to my valuation. I am willing to pay up to $14,000 for the product.
Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I can come down to $15,000.  This is my best offer, as I have other interested buyers.

Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still not convinced that $15,000 is the right price for me. Could we meet somewhere in the middle? I'd like to propose $14,500 for the product.
